rpl_pack.utilsÔÉÅ

Utility classes and functions mostly for internal use.

Functions

decode_arrays

Decode json objects into numpy arrays.

encode_arrays

Encode numpy arrays as json objets using NumpyEncoder.

m3m3_scfstb

Convert from from cubic meter (m3)/cubic meter (m3) standard cubic feet (scf)/stock tank barrel (stb).

make_array

Create numpy array from any native data type and/or data structure.

scfstb_m3m3

Convert from standard cubic feet (scf)/stock tank barrel (stb) to cubic meter (m3)/cubic meter (m3).

timer

Decorator to time a function.

Classes

NumpyEncoder

Subclass of json.JSONEncoder used for encoding numpy arrays as json objects.
